column4: I shut down my PC while GParted was moving my ext4 partition. now it is screwed up. can I try to recover it with tools like testdisk ?
you should always make a backup of your important data before playing with gparted...
even at this point when you did not make a backup before, you should do NOW make a backup with dd before trying to rescue the partition
yep, y backed it up with ddrescue
